OOC: You said he Prime grabbed at Hot Rod. So Hot Rod could have moved.

::Hot Rod::

He was hit by the sword, knocking him aside. That also made all the
blats miss. Hot Rod pulled one of the few fusion grenades he had, and
through it at Prime. It was the kind that stuck, and didn't come off.
